sources.title: THOSE BITTER SWEETS (1915)
sources.description: Those Bitter Sweets (1915) with Mae Busch, Harry McCoy, Mack Swain directed by F. Richard Jones Keystone Film Company Note. The .avi download of this film here is somewhat better quality than the one for online viewing on this page.

metadata.Plot: Dell takes girlfriend Mae out for a ride in his Chevy but has to contend with romantic rival Dell, another one of Mae's suitors.
metadata.Actors: Harry McCoy, Mae Busch, Dell Henderson
